title: I went to the holy land..

comments.comment: “Mommy buys, daddy assembles, Bjorn enjoys” the perfect teamwork, so cute
Speaking 4 languages to that child from the get go is such a power move. Never stop doing that, he will truly appreciate it when he's older.
It's surreal to think bjorn would have an entire library of videos of his parents growing up, not just old VHS tapes but lengthy edited videos.
Felix truly unlocked the good ending for internet content creators. Very inspiring and wholesome.

It’s still so crazy that Pewds (semi-retired) in his 30s. What a lucky guy Bjorn is to be able to have both his parents be so present in his life. Growing up I didn’t see much of my dad. He still made time for us, but man It makes me so happy to see Bjorn have this blessing especially in his early years of his development!

Seeing Felix jacked, with a family, and happy, legitimately put tears in my eyes… 

You deserve the world brother

I’ve been watching pewds since 2012 when I was 17. I go through seasons with what kind of content I’m into consuming on a regular, and I haven’t watched Felix consistently for a couple of years. But I still come in and check up on him periodically, and seeing how far he’s come legitimately fills me with joy. His astronomical success has not changed how wholesome and genuine he is. I don’t know him or Marzia, but following him for so long, seeing each of his milestones from hitting 1mil, to 10, to 50, 100, getting married, becoming a dad. It feels like family. And it makes me proud. Keep killing it Felix, you’re the best.
bjorn is so adorable such a contagious smile

When people talk dad lore, this the dad lore i want. Bro met the love of his life, bro became bro man, bro moved to japan, bro has a healthy and beautiful kid, bro jacked, bro livin the life. Yo pewds ur life rn is the idea of my pure bliss.

Thank you, Marzia for the hard work you put into editing and also filming the vlogs. 

It was cute seeing Felix say that he misses his family
bro completed life 🥹
"they're here fo Marzia's vlog" so true bestie. i miss marzia vlogs and vids so much. If I can get a taste of her wonderful calming and beautiful editing than I will be here forever

I remember seeing the video where first he announces getting Edgar when it first came out, then he was just the tiniest puppy jumping at the chance to bite the plushy american football in order to "train him for barrels". Now Edgar's an old man and Pewds has a whole family.

He's come a long way over the past fifteen years. And we are all so proud of him.
can we just appreciate that pewds MASTERED aesthetic vlogging, like so many pretty shots. Idk why this guy hasn't directed an indie film yet
Jesus! He's going to be fluent in English, Swedish, Italian, & Japanese... He's going to be an impressive kid.

"is it hot over here?, and its not mum?" What an amazing interaction between parents. Its so nice to see the positive interactions when so often in media we never see the sweet interactions between parents!

I know that I don't know them... and you can never really know people when they're in front of the camera. But DAMN. The love Felix has for his family... for Marzia and Bjorn. This is seriously the most inspiring life I've ever seen. 

Most of the time I take my heroes from books, because they don't change and can't disappoint. But Felix and Marzia might be a my 'couple hero' for me. Love you guys.

22:31  
This spider is not venomous and is very timid.
It does not bite unless it is mischievous.

They are also very good at pest control.
If left alone, they will become friends.

They just don't look good!
Hell, the way it sticks to the ceiling.

Thanks for enjoying life in Japan!

its so weird.. i remember watching him play amnesia in 2012, hiding behind covers because how scary it was for me as a child. not im watching him live his life with a lifelong partner and the cutest, healthiest little baby :') makes my heart warm
13:50 Felix is giving so much dad energy now  he's like that one dad with the video camera telling people to get in the shot or wave to the camera.
Not Felix starting to sing "Bitch Lasagna" to Björn!!

I’m deleting YouTube and making sure not to spend too much much time online any more, so thank you for all the laughs and making my day over the years when I was walking home after the bus stop this is the last video I’m watching on YouTube thank you for all the years just remember be happy and beautiful child!!!!

I love how Felix and Marzia can still be themselves, doing their own hobbies and traveling with friends while being amazing parents to Björn and the pugs  And Björn is such a happy baby! His smile and laugher are so infectious
Seeing the looks of joy on Felix and Marzia’s  faces when they look at Björn is so special. I couldn’t be happier for you.
1:15 I'm too high to explain how much joy this made me feel.  Somehow Felix singing bitch lasagna, is what has made my life complete.
This is the best youtube ark. It doesn't get any better, this should be where everyone wants to end up.
I love how Marzia finally shows herself fully in the vlogs from just the hands and back! All the love
seeing pewdiepie do side quests make me so happy

My heart is so full to see this family enjoying life together, but absolutely bursts at the seams thinking about how Bjorn will be able to watch all of this back when he’s older and see how much his parents love him.
(2:35) Björn staring at that cinnamon roll in utter delight cures my depression.
The high five after "mommy buys, daddy assembles, Bjorn enjoys" was just so pure. Best parents ever, glad Marzia seems like she's in such a happy place, you guys make me want to live a better life.
As someone who has been watching pewds since a young age, it's literally such a proud feeling to see how far he has come and won in life. Keep going king

As someone who didn’t have parents in my life I’m always so happy to see families being families.  The love you have for one another is adorable and uplifting.  Thank you for being the parents I wish I had.  Bjorn is one lucky duck.  You guys deserve the world!
Why does this video actually have me crying  his life just seems so content
Björn will grow up knowing Swedish, Italian, English and Japanese that's a big flex
We were blessed with a 32min video, Felix and Marzia seems so happy, I've been loving this new arc of pewdiepie's history
Marzia keeps cranking out these banger vlogs, she literally never misses. It's kinda crazy.
あなたの日常の一部を共有してくれてありがとう！　いつも幸せな気持ちになってます！
Just catching a glimpse of Marzia’s face leaves me in awe. She’s so beautiful

I think the reason people enjoy watching Felix vlogs now and have enjoyed watching him is because we get to see what we believe to be the sorta end of the YT era sort of for Felix. He’s living a seemingly normal and peaceful life after so many years in YT from the ups and downs. I for one haven’t been watching Felix as long as some of the other subscribers have, but it feels good watching these chill vlogs into Felix’s life now the background noises, the cinematic cuts as well just feels nice to watch.
If anyone deserved to have their life turn into a movie, it’s these two. So happy for them, I could watch these vlogs forever

22:09
Felix: "It's not scary, huh?"

Edgar so peaceful in his old age, watching Bjorn become the legacy

Björn is growing so fast. Tbh I love these videos the most, seeing you, Marzia, Björn, Edgar and Momo having fun, travelling, just the family vibe like you're watching Modern Family. Can't wait till the next one!
seeing you with Marcia, Bjorn, the dogs and in japan makes me happy, really the dream life, very happy for you
Crazy how the Pewdiepie channel showcases Felix’s life from doing let’s play horror games, to his beef with T series, to now having a child?! Truly incredible, wish you the best of luck Felix!
It's always relaxing to see pewd and his family venturing out
Thank you for posting your life. You and Marzia have been so generous with your privacy and your experiences, it's been so so wonderful to follow the past 10 years.
I am so happy for Felix and his family. I’ve been subscribed to Pewdiepie since I was 13, and now I’m almost 24 years old🫢. It makes me SO happy seeing them all happy. And Bjorn is adorable

I've been having health issues and mental issues these last days. Looking at Felix's family makes me feel better man!
 Keep it up Pewds, and thank you.
Felix telling Connor to keep waving to the camera like a dad recording his kids
The way Björn looks at Marzia is the sweetest thing. So much love on his little expressive face

You can tell these vlogs are filled with love--from the family and activities in them, to the way the shots are framed, to how the videos are cut together. It's refreshing. Thank you for sharing your beautiful family and wholesome life with the Internet, something that's become a rarity in the world/on social media these days. ️

Coming back and seeing Pewds being Felix and living such a wholesome, happy life brings tears of joy to my eyes and hope to my heart.

Congrats to Felix, Marzia and Björn on all your happiness. It's well earned.
Björn is so adorable  the little outfits you and Marzia put him in is to die for, seeing your family bond makes me so happy ️

Time never stops. Still remember the bad camera quality and now you have an entire family. Man life sucks sometimes, but it’s also so beautiful so thank you for helping millions of us along the way man. FUCKING LEGEND FOR L!!!!

Thank you Marzia, Thank you Felix
For this happy, adorable and smiling human little beeing called Björn. Seeing him smile, always giving me hope and peace ️

Bjorn is the luckiest child to have been born in this century. Makes me want to be a dad 🥹
hilarious contrast between felix trying to help bby get over his fear of caterpillar and then the next shot of Felix ten yards away from the spider muttering "I have to kill it, I have to"

These little vlogs always put a smile on my face even when I feel shitty <3 

 It's crazy to think that I've gone from watching Felix scream at horror games in 2012 to wholesome vlogging with his wife and child in Japan in 2024 :')
Japan is a beautiful place, It's hands down my second home! From the people, the food, the spots to sight see, and the loot you can find and buy!! Japan is truly a magical place

I feel so happy for you man...
 
Hoping you keep up with your life now. You really inspired me back then, all the laughs, all the fun moments... You really are the best Pewds, and you'll always be. Now you as a father :] Marzia as beautiful as a mother and now Bjorn.
Keep it up bro
This is my favorite era of pewds, i grew up watching him for almost 10 years now its almost like watching an older brother all the love to felix

really like these videos normally im not the type of person to like family style vlogs but it really feels like they arent filming every second of their kids life and they are acting infront of the camera not to mention how realistic it is i feel like he isnt using every moment to film and just does it when he wants

Pewds it makes me very happy to have seen you come to be what you are today and see that you’re happy with bjorn, you helped me go through so much and I’m greatly grateful. Lots of love

Bear is such a funny little guy, he has Marzia's eye shape and eyebrows a bit but the rest is all Felix, I can even imagine baby felix looking just like him, even the sassiness and hidden cheeky intentions lol, that kid is gonna flip his house upside down! and so smart like both too. I love watching Felix’s vlogs mainly because it’s very aesthetic and I love watching Björn’s smile. He is such a happy kid (I mean he’s got great parents so he is really bound to be happy).
Pewdiepie, you got me into bouldering and climbing, and I've been doing it for about six months. I feel amazing and my life has turned around. Thank you!

I've been watching Pewds for well over 10 years now. It's crazy how I went from being scared and laughing with Pewds to feeling pure peace while watching his VLOGS.

Thank you for everything you have put up with. Wish you and your family the best. To another ten+ years

It warms my heart so much to see Pewdie now I’ll never get over it :’) from watching him play amnesia when I was 14 to seeing him having a beautiful life and family now, thank you Felix for making my younger years better by being excited to watch you when I get home from school.  wishing your lil boy the best childhood and blessings to your family!
2:42 Pewdiepie started to have dad-like laugh omg lol

I lived in Japan for 6 years while I was in the military.  I also have a Japanese wife and two kids (7 and 9 years old).  Whenever I see these vlogs I miss Japan and I also miss the times that Felix is going through. It reminds me of my past. It’s such an amazing country. Happy you are in such a good time in your life Felix.
Bjorn has for parents two incredible people raising him. Bless you.

Watching Felix be a dad is something special. I started watching him back in the hay days of youtube, this video is so special

..Also, baby sort of looks like a mini Gordon Ramsay. I love him

These videos always make me so happy. Seeing Felix living his best life with his family and friends puts the biggest smile on my face. Thank you for continuing to share with us even with your retirement.
